title: Hollywood AI
description: Developed and deployed a user-friendly platform for AI-powered film summaries, achieving a 95% satisfaction rate based on feedback on accuracy and readability, using Next.js. TypeScript, Firebase. Check it out at https://hollywoodai.vercel.app

title: Everest NFT Marketplace
description: Transformed a static single-page application into an interactive UI with animations, transitions, and carousels, utilising Axios for dynamic data representation. Employed Git for version control and collaboration. Check it out at https://remote-internship-finished.vercel.app

title: Social Media App
description: Developed a full-stack social media app with features like posts, post feeds, likes, modals, and authentication, using Firebase for database management. Check it out at https://social-media-app-pink.vercel.app
